info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 1:49PM EST until further notice by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Housatonic River at Gaylordsville. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 9.5 feet, The water reaches businesses on the low side of Spring Street. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:31 PM EST Wednesday the stage was 8.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 9.2 feet tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Housatonic River Gaylordsville Flood Stage: 8.0 Observed Stage at Wed 1 pm: 8.8 Forecast: Wed 7 pm 8.9 Thu 1 am 9.1 Thu 7 am 9.2 Thu 1 pm 9.2 Thu 7 pm 9.1 Fri 1 am 8.9 Fri 7 am 8.7 Fri 1 pm 8.5 Fri 7 pm 8.2 Sat 1 am 7.9 Sat 7 am 8.0 &&
